snippet.title: ROVA - Pre-Alpha Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
ROVA: A Cosy Space-Rover Simulator. 
► Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2930130/ROVA

Take Photographs and Conduct Research to help progress mankind's first attempts at colonising new worlds.

Features
Space photography (images save to your pc!)
Exploration
A strong 3D line-art style 
Day/Night Cycles
Colonists with day schedules you can follow

To Follow the games' development, check out our socials below!

- Our Socials -
​​► TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@free_range_devs
► Twitter - https://twitter.com/FreeRangeDevs
